duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan and perform rough and finish machining on a variety of machines, both CNC and manual.
Read blueprints and understand geometric tolerances.
Utilize machinist tools and hand tools (micrometers, verniers, indicators, scales, dial bore gage).
Be open to coaching and training, with a willingness to learn all machines within a cell.
Perform other duties as responsibilities necessitate.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma or GED equivalent; concentration in machining would be a plus.
Minimum of three years of experience
